knimeNode.name: Spacy NER
knimeNode.shortDescription: The node assigns recognized named entities in the document. Generalized spaCy NE tag set is used.

fullDescription.intro: The node assigns recognized named entities in the document. Generalized spaCy NE tag set is used. Different spaCy models might have different tag sets. Different spaCy models might lack this model.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select a Document column that will be affected by NER tagging.
If checked, the document column will be replaced by the new preprocessed documents. Otherwise the preprocessed documents will be appended as a new column.
The name of the new appended column, containing the preprocessed documents.

tab.name: Model
tab.option: Pick one of the official spaCy models, or refer to a custom model stored in the filesystem. In the latter case refer to a folder with meta.json and config files.

tab.name: Python
tab.option:
Select one of Python execution environment options:
use default Python environment for Deep Learning
use Conda environment

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the documents to preprocess.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains the preprocessed documents.
